p: Bioaerosol sampling involves the removal and collection of particles of biological origin from the atmosphere [ 11]. There is a considerable variety of bioaerosol sampling and analysis methods. But there are several limitations, including the lack of standardized methods and protocols that are effective in sampling and analyzing all types of bioaerosols [ 12, 13]. Therefore, comparing results between research studies becomes a difficult task due to the use of substantially different sampling and analysis methods.
